医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
以前未被识别的一类抗体可以广泛中和多种病毒株研究人员发现了一类以前未被认识的抗体——预防疾病的免疫系统蛋白——似乎能够中和多种形式的流感病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Previously-unrecognized-class-of-antibodies-can-broadly-neutralize-multiple-virus-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Previously-unrecognized-class-of-antibodies-can-broadly-neutralize-multiple-virus-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1715d553-79e6-4112-a2a1-4d6c09729f61 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:58:00 -0500 Previously unrecognized class of antibodies can broadly neutralize multiple virus strains
研究揭示了酶在晚期前列腺癌进展中的作用据美国癌​​症协会称，前列腺癌是除皮肤癌之外男性最常见的癌症，每年诊断出超过 288,000 例新病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-sheds-light-on-enzymes-role-in-advanced-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-sheds-light-on-enzymes-role-in-advanced-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59cc5e9b-e6d0-4ebd-8df4-e675b7920fe9 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:54:00 -0500 Study sheds light on enzyme's role in advanced prostate cancer progression
密歇根大学项目旨在改善机器人假肢的控制密歇根大学项目的目标是为机器人假肢用户提供更顺畅的体验，该项目得到了美国国立卫生研究院的重新支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/University-of-Michigan-project-seeks-to-improve-control-of-robotic-prosthetic-legs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/University-of-Michigan-project-seeks-to-improve-control-of-robotic-prosthetic-legs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3c8b3b2-5e29-445b-8d5b-8b808a7b94e0 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:50:44 -0500 University of Michigan project seeks to improve control of robotic prosthetic legs
CHEST 赢得 100,000 美元拨款，以提高间质性肺疾病的诊断质量美国胸科医师学会 (CHEST) 获得医学专业协会委员会 (CMSS) 授予的 100,000 美元拨款，用于提高间质性肺疾病 (ILD) 的诊断水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/CHEST-wins-24100000-grant-to-improve-diagnostic-excellence-in-interstitial-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/CHEST-wins-24100000-grant-to-improve-diagnostic-excellence-in-interstitial-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e82f3db3-4fb1-4b26-aac4-e0b83e9982d4 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:43:09 -0500 CHEST wins $100,000 grant to improve diagnostic excellence in interstitial lung disease
为细胞质的隐藏组织提供新的线索早在 2018 年，纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的医学博士 Christine Mayr 的实验室就向世界介绍了一种一直隐藏在众目睽睽之下的关键细胞成分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Shedding-new-light-on-the-hidden-organization-of-the-cytoplasm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Shedding-new-light-on-the-hidden-organization-of-the-cytoplasm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e29f9534-5c4d-4c6f-b23a-1d464657e1f8 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:36:40 -0500 Shedding new light on the hidden organization of the cytoplasm
研究表明种族主义与不良健康结果密切相关来自多个机构的健康公平研究人员团队利用复杂的数据网络来检验一个假设：结构性种族主义与社区层面的资源和结构有关，而这些资源和结构与健康状况不佳密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Research-illustrates-how-racism-is-deeply-interlated-with-poor-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Research-illustrates-how-racism-is-deeply-interlated-with-poor-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ad4ba99-a85f-4b02-9029-9aef6da4709b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:26:18 -0500 Research illustrates how racism is deeply interrelated with poor health outcomes
言语很重要：以同理心和希望来诊断帕金森病随着美国帕金森病的诊断率持续上升，患者接触运动障碍专家的机会有限，这意味着传达毁灭性的、改变生活的消息的工作落在了初级保健医生或社区神经科医生身上，他们可能不具备完成这项敏感任务所需的专业知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Words-matter-Delivering-Parkinsons-diagnosis-with-empathy-and-hope.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Words-matter-Delivering-Parkinsons-diagnosis-with-empathy-and-hope.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=034f871b-fb77-4dbb-8ddc-df02862b2039 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:12:37 -0500 Words matter: Delivering Parkinson's diagnosis with empathy and hope
最近的泌尿学试验更有可能包含有关治疗有害影响的数据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《The Journal of Urology®》一月号的一项研究报告称，近年来，主要泌尿外科期刊上的临床试验报告更有可能包含有关治疗有害影响的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Recent-urology-trials-more-likely-to-include-data-on-harmful-effects-of-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Recent-urology-trials-more-likely-to-include-data-on-harmful-effects-of-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc7b1184-6ef5-4205-92e2-dc3f8565f822 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:58:53 -0500 Recent urology trials more likely to include data on harmful effects of treatments
种族健康不平等比经济差异更能激发对变革的支持一项新的研究发现，与健康和身体健康相关的种族差异比与经济等其他因素相关的种族差异更能激励美国人采取社会变革行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Racial-health-inequalities-spark-more-support-for-change-than-economic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Racial-health-inequalities-spark-more-support-for-change-than-economic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31c8ec42-a08d-4bcf-9175-f73f5ebaaf08 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:47:50 -0500
研究揭示麻疹病毒如何在人脑中变异和传播梅奥诊所的研究人员绘制了麻疹病毒如何在患有罕见致命脑部疾病的人的大脑中突变和传播的图谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-reveals-how-measles-virus-mutates-and-spreads-in-the- human-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-reveals-how-measles-virus-mutates-and-spreads-in-the- human-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32016125-8651-4e54-9dd9-4f6e3314c7e7 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:38:55 -0500 Study reveals how measles virus mutates and spreads in the human brain
